Articles.Content:
**F-104 Starfighter**

One of the finest and beautifull birds on Kerbin (and Earth by the way)! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![1430683607-2015-05-03-00009.jpg](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/18/1430683607-2015-05-03-00009.jpg)

Single-seat version ( F-104A )

![1430683608-2015-05-03-00012.jpg](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/18/1430683608-2015-05-03-00012.jpg)

Dual-seat version ( F-104B )

![1430683611-2015-05-03-00011.jpg](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/18/1430683611-2015-05-03-00011.jpg)

Additionals fuel-tanks are safely ejected thank to winglets.

**MOD NEEDED** : [TweakScale - Rescale Everything!](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/344/TweakScale%20-%20Rescale%20Everything!)

**DOWNLOAD Ã¢â€ â€œ**

- **** [**F-104A ( no fuel tanks )**](http://www./download/sdsi0zbs45dq4e8/F-104+Starfighter.craft)
- **** [**F-104A ( fuel-tanks on wings-tips )**](http://www./download/k4tk1ttmjw8uetr/F-104+Starfighter+%28+fuel+tank+%29.craft)
- **** [**F-104B ( no fuel tanks )**](http://www./download/3sqx3kpklkyqfya/F-104B+Starfighter.craft)
- **** [**F-104B ( fuel-tanks on wings-tips )**](http://www./download/c4je8ohrqlc4lci/F-104B+Starfighter+%28fuel+tank%29.craft)

**INSTRUCTIONS & COMMANDS :**

**Action nÃ‚Â°1 Ã¢â€ â€™ Flaps**

**Action nÃ‚Â°2 Ã¢â€ â€™ Steering nose wheel**

**Spoilers are activated with brakes command**

Enjoy it! Now you can train your kerbonauts or... add some weapons! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T22:43:11Z" title="05/03/2015 10:43  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Space\_nico**
It is fully stock except for the size. I used tweakscale for almost match with the real one, so... I tried without the mod and it's not so good. ^^'
I meant for the droptanks as well. I want to fly someone else's version, but I don't have the room for any mods now.

> 
> I meant for the droptanks as well. I want to fly someone else's version, but I don't have the room for any mods now.

[F-104A](http://www./download/toxxn93kytvary3/F-104+Starfighter+no+mod.craft)

[F-104B](http://www./download/2l91mby1pybx8f4/F-104B+Starfighter+no+mod.craft)

I did it without mod and most faithful to the real one. However, it's only without wing-tips tanks... :/ I hope you'll enjoy it! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
